title: Most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The highest Country Germany has 8.8 more Share in total export than the lowest Country Italy.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The highest Country Germany has 8.8 more Share in total export than the lowest Country Italy.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share in total export in the y axis.
The Share in total export is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The Share in total export of Country Italy is 3.15% smaller than the maximum value at Germany.
Country Germany is higher than any other Countrys with value 12.9, followed by United States, and United Kingdom. Down to Country Italy with the lowest value 4.1.
The Country Italy has 1.6 times less Share in total export than average.
